about_the_game:
Prepare to embark on a daring journey into the depths of The Mountainhome. Climb treacherous vertical dungeons and reclaim your lost legacy in a world steeped in mystery and danger. Set within the abandoned halls of an ancient dwarven mountain cave, your wits, agility, and determination will be pushed to their limits in this captivating roguelite precision-platformer.

Climb Vertical Dungeons

Master the art of precision platforming as you navigate intricately designed levels filled with peril. Each ascent presents new challenges, from devious traps to relentless foes, ensuring no two climbs are ever the same.

Gather Precious Resources

Discover and collect valuable resources scattered throughout the depths of The Mountainhome. Bring your findings back to the expedition base to enhance your equipment and increase your chances of survival.

Upgrade Your Gear

Every decision shapes your journey. Strategically balance resource collection and equipment upgrades to maximize your potential. Tailor your gear to your preferred playstyle and adapt to the ever-increasing challenges of The Mountainhome.

Challenge Yourself

For the brave and determined, each level offers optional feats of daring. Conquer these formidable tasks to earn bonus resources, bolster your gear, and prove your mastery. Rise above your peers and earn your place as a legendary dwarf.

Immerse yourself in the atmospheric world of a forgotten dwarven stronghold. Explore beautifully crafted environments, where danger lurks in every shadow and each step brings you closer to reclaiming your heritage. Will you have the courage to rise to the challenge and restore your legacy?
detailed_description:
Wishlist and Follow Now!


About the Game

Prepare to embark on a daring journey into the depths of The Mountainhome. Climb treacherous vertical dungeons and reclaim your lost legacy in a world steeped in mystery and danger. Set within the abandoned halls of an ancient dwarven mountain cave, your wits, agility, and determination will be pushed to their limits in this captivating roguelite precision-platformer.

Climb Vertical Dungeons

Master the art of precision platforming as you navigate intricately designed levels filled with peril. Each ascent presents new challenges, from devious traps to relentless foes, ensuring no two climbs are ever the same.

Gather Precious Resources

Discover and collect valuable resources scattered throughout the depths of The Mountainhome. Bring your findings back to the expedition base to enhance your equipment and increase your chances of survival.

Upgrade Your Gear

Every decision shapes your journey. Strategically balance resource collection and equipment upgrades to maximize your potential. Tailor your gear to your preferred playstyle and adapt to the ever-increasing challenges of The Mountainhome.

Challenge Yourself

For the brave and determined, each level offers optional feats of daring. Conquer these formidable tasks to earn bonus resources, bolster your gear, and prove your mastery. Rise above your peers and earn your place as a legendary dwarf.

Immerse yourself in the atmospheric world of a forgotten dwarven stronghold. Explore beautifully crafted environments, where danger lurks in every shadow and each step brings you closer to reclaiming your heritage. Will you have the courage to rise to the challenge and restore your legacy?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 or newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended

name: Dwarf Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended

short_description: A challenging precision-platformer. Conquer vertical dungeons of The Mountainhome, battling relentless swarms of enemies and navigating perilous traps. Uncover the secret of your lost legacy hidden atop the highest peak and secure the future of your village.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
